{"id":1111856647,"question_id":3208,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1701657589,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"37 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1111856647/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Beautiful Substrings II","memory":"45.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n       public long beautifulSubstrings(String s, int k) {\n        int n = s.length(), v = 0, left;\n        for (left = 1; left * left % (k * 4) > 0; ++left);\n        Set<Character> vowels = new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'));\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer>[] seen = new HashMap[left];\n        for (int i = 0; i < left; i++) {\n            seen[i] = new HashMap<>();\n        }\n        seen[left - 1].put(0, 1);\n        long res = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            v += vowels.contains(s.charAt(i)) ? 1: -1;\n            int c = seen[i % left].getOrDefault(v, 0);\n            res += c;\n            seen[i % left].put(v, c + 1);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-beautiful-substrings-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
